name: Flight of the Wisp
blurb: Master the elements to help a sentient ball of energy escape an underground steampunk lab in this casual puzzle game for PC.

rewards.reward: Our sincerest thanks, and your name as a backer in the credits of the game.
Receive a copy of the game when released and your name as a backer in the credits of the game.
Receive two copies of the game, one for you and a friend, as well as your name as a backer in the credits of the game.
Receive Early Beta Access, a copy of the game, our personal thanks in a developer signed postcard featuring artwork from the game, and your name as a backer in the credits of the game.

Receive one 11.25"x17.3" Poster of your choice from 5 different Flight of the Wisp Designs, early Beta Access, a copy of the game, our personal thanks in a developer signed postcard featuring artwork from the game, and your name as a backer in the credits of the game.
